alert.note: Alert for Curry County; Quay County; Roosevelt County; Union County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 23 at 2:21PM MST until January 24 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Curry County, Quay County, Roosevelt County, and Union County. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing fog is possible in portions of Union county tonight where temperatures may drop below freezing. A mixture of rain and snow showers may also create slick roadways in this area.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Curry County; Quay County; Roosevelt County; Union County
